TriggerOraclev10g.name: SADER_LINKED
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
DECLARE

/*???? ?????? ?????? ???????? ??????? ?? ???? osd.comm_sader.*/

s osd.comm_sader%rowtype;

BEGIN
IF DBMS_REPUTIL.FROM_REMOTE = FALSE THEN

IF INSERTING THEN

select * into s
from osd.comm_sader
where process_no = :new.linked_code;

insert into osd.comm_sader (
process_no, year, sader_no, year_sader, sader_date_dd, sader_date_mm, sader_date_yy, user_id,
SADER_CLASS, DEPARTMENT_NO, RECIEVED_TO_CODE, SADER_IN_OUT, SADER_IN_OUT_DATE_DD, SADER_IN_OUT_DATE_MM ,SADER_IN_OUT_DATE_YY,
SADER_ACCOMPANIED, YEAR_PROCESS, SADER_SEC, PROCESS_FLAG ,
IN_DATE, IN_TIME, FLAG1, AUTOINS, RANGE_CODE, SIG_CODE, PACKAGE, CHEKE, linked
)
values (
:new.process_no, :new.year, :new.sader_no, :new.year_sader, s.sader_date_dd, s.sader_date_mm, s.sader_date_yy, :new.user_id,
s.SADER_CLASS, s.DEPARTMENT_NO, s.RECIEVED_TO_CODE, s.SADER_IN_OUT, s.SADER_IN_OUT_DATE_DD, s.SADER_IN_OUT_DATE_MM ,s.SADER_IN_OUT_DATE_YY,
s.SADER_ACCOMPANIED, s.YEAR_PROCESS, s.SADER_SEC, s.PROCESS_FLAG ,s.IN_DATE , s.IN_TIME , s.FLAG1,
s.AUTOINS, s.RANGE_CODE, s.SIG_CODE, s.PACKAGE , s.CHEKE, 1
);

elsif deleting then

begin
delete from comm_sader
where process_no = :old.process_no;
exception
when no_data_found then null;
end;

END IF;

END IF; -- IF DBMS_REPUTIL.FROM_REMOTE

EXCEPTION
WHEN no_data_found THEN null;
END;
